function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertain understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate NPI measures","Mitigation":"Continued research and data collection","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and simulation tools","People":"General population","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in people's response to NPIs","Impact":"Inconsistent effectiveness of NPI measures","Mitigation":"Public education and clear communication","Technologies":"Communication and social media platforms","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities and government agencies"},{"Description":"High social and economic costs of suppression strategy","Impact":"Adverse impact on health and well-being","Mitigation":"Targeted financial support and social welfare measures","Technologies":"Digital payment systems and social support platforms","People":"At-risk populations and economically vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government and social welfare organizations"}]}
